name: unreluctant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
willing to do something: He was an unreluctant hero who liked to tear open his shirt and show off his scars. He leaves, taking the unreluctant Sara away with him. Opposite
reluctant
More examplesFewer examplesShe took the title role in the film in which she got an unreluctant Bob Hope in her clutches.You find yourself smiling first with reluctant admiration, then smiling with unreluctant admiration.She's the band's lyricist and unreluctant star.Children are unreluctant readers if they have the right books to read.
